raw: The container shipping industry , a bellwether for international trade , has been blown off course by the new virus , which brought parts of China to a standstill before spreading around the world , leading container lines to re - route cargoes and reduce calls to Chinese ports .

raw: Despite lower volume growth , Maersk ( MAERSKb . CO ) still expects to make higher first - quarter earnings than a year ago thanks to savings and steps to offset the higher cost of low - sulfur fuel , it said , sending its battered shares more than 7 % higher by 1045 GMT .

raw: Smaller German rival Hapag - Lloyd ( HLAG.DE ) said the outbreak would curb business growth at least until the middle of the year , but that falling fuel costs should help lessen financial impact on the company , which has set aside funds to help cope with the crisis .
